The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
I am delighted to announce some additional activities that will be starting very soon. Please take a minute to look at the options below. To register you interest in the activities, then please use the links or contacts provided.
The British Soccer School
Mondays from 3.30 – 4.45 - Starting on Monday 9th September -Years 3 and 4 training session -Years 5 and 6 training session -First session is free of charge, all sessions afterwards will include a cost of 1000rb -The British Football School will also be running a series of weekend training sessions. Please visit their website http://britishfootballschool.com and click here to download The British Football School flyer and click here for the weekend session flyer of The British Football School. For more information contact info@britishfootballschool.com.
Click on the link below to secure your place for the Monday evening sessions. You will be able to register for the activity from Tuesday 3rd September at 6pm.
https://www.eventbrite.com/event/7977301323
Field Hockey Training – All abilities welcome
Sundays from 10.30 – 12.00 on the dates below September 8th, 15th, 22nd, 29th October 6th, 13th -All children from years 2 – 8 are welcome to join. -Students will be split into appropriate age groups for each of the sessions. -Sticks are provided. -All sessions are free.
Please email coach Anna Blok on awblokversteeg@yahoo.com by Thursday 5th September. This is to allow for the ISM security team to be notified prior to the start of the activity.
If you have any questions then please do not hesitate to get in touch,
Kindest regards,
Adam Hoult Teacher of Physical Education The International School of Moscow World Class Education
